name: v2.3.80
body:
- The saving of filters for charts has been introduced
- Graphs for energy meters gained the opportunity to present in the "balloon" data for the selected phase.
- Added the ability to add multiple accounts to one application and switch between them.

name: v2.3.79
body:
1. Redesigned application settings and added new options:
- Ability to change the height of the channel
- C / F temperature units can be changed.
- Ability to disable auto-hiding buttons
- Ability to hide the button (s)
- Ability to reorder channels

2. The appearance and formatting of the channels have been modified
3. Changing the minimum version of the SDK to 21
4. Introduction of the Kotlin language
5. First steps towards MVVM transition

name: v2.3.78
body:
- Lost word in Polish added.
- Improved the refreshing of warnings in the channel details.

name: v2.3.76
body:
- Roller shutters - improving the visualization taking into account the bottom position,
- Display of warnings in channel details,
- Supplement to Italian translations,
- Overcurrent protection for the staircase timer.

name: v2.3.75
body: - The roller shutter recalibration button has been added

name: v2.3.74
body: - Fixed a data display issue that occurs in a specific case when switching from a three-phase meter to a single-phase meter view.

name: v2.3.73
body: - Fixed formatting of floating point values

name: v2.3.72
body:
- Fixed an issue of inconsistencies in the graphs of the pulse and energy meters that could occur when the data download to the graphs was interrupted,
- Support for devices with overcurrent protection,
- Icon added for charging stations,
- Supplementing the translations,
- Changing the formatting of floating-point values for pulse and energy counters.

name: v2.3.71
body: - Minor fixes

name: v2.3.70
body:
- Support for the communication protocol version 15
- Support for control channels associated with measurement channels
- Support for an indirect garage door opening sensor
- Resolves the issue of triggering the channel move function when moving a channel to the right or left.

name: v2.3.69
body: - The details of the energy meter have been adapted to the single phase meter

name: v2.3.68
body: - Fixed a timeout issue with Password Manager Assisted Authentication.

name: v2.3.67
body:
- The possibility of changing the order of channels in groups has been introduced
- Corrections of messages in English
- Additional "Supla Cloud" button in the yellow status window
- Added link to "Supla Cloud" in the application menu
- Change the behavior of the button to view the password (no need to hold)
- The channel status window has been extended with the channel identifier
- The ability to add an application to the cloud has been introduced without the need to enable registration (the application will ask for a password)
- The ability to edit the name of the channel and the name of the location from the application level has been introduced
- Improved sensitivity on the info button (i)
- In Android 7, you could sometimes click the action button without moving the channel. Fixed

name: v2.3.66
body: - Digiglass - an additional warning has been added informing about exceeding 20 hours of work.

name: v2.3.65
body: - Support for DGF Smart Glass has been added

name: v2.3.64
body: - Zamel DIW-01 dimmer support has been added

name: v2.3.63
body: - The possibility of manual reordering of channels within a location has been introduced. The order can be changed by holding the selected channel for a longer time and then moving it to the new place.

name: v2.3.62
body:
The help page / forum address has been localized relative to the user's country,
Information about the firmware version of the dimming chip  has been added to the V-Pro Smart dimmer configuration window.

name: v2.3.61
body:
- Dependencies updated to the latest versions,
- The minimum version of the SDK has been raised to 14,
- Add Device Wizard compatible with the latest Android versions,
- The ability to change the status diode settings from the application level for V-Pro Smart dimmers has been introduced.

name: v2.3.60
body:
- The amount of data downloaded to charts during a single request has been increased,
- The roller shutter control window has been redesigned,
- Support for roof windows has been introduced.

name: v2.3.58
body: Solved the problem of deleting and re-downloading energy / gas / water meter history data.

name: v2.3.57
body:
- Spanish translation corrections,
- Change of markings in the user interface of the Heatpol Home + heater.

name: v2.3.56
body: - Complete missing translations (Czech, German, Spanish, Greek, French, Croatian, Italian, Lithuanian, Norwegian, Dutch, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Slovak, Slovenian).

name: v2.3.55
body:
- V-Pro dimmer setup wizard has been improved,
- Fixed return button in channel groups,
- Z-Wave configuration wizard - the refreshing of the nodes list has been improved.

name: v2.3.54
body:
Fixed an issue with the power button that occurred when changing the wheel to a slider,
Fixed an issue with the dimmer settings button not being active.

name: v2.3.53
body: - Fixed an issue with the adding wizard on tablet devices.

name: v2.3.52
body:
- Implementation of the wake up z-wave nodes settings window. 
- Communication library update.

name: v2.3.51
body:
- Improvements to the Varilight dimmer configuration window,
- Slider, dimmer wheel/RGB - allows the pointer to jump quickly to the point you touch,
- Superuser authorization window - added a procedure to check if the user is already authorized in order not to ask for a password again.

name: v2.3.50
body: - The waiting time for the result of a WiFi network scan has been increased.

name: v2.3.49
body: - Minor fix related to the window informing about the need to wait for the next wifi network scan.

name: v2.3.48
body: - Fixed an issue with the add devices wizard on tablet devices.

name: v2.3.47
body:
- The wizard for adding devices has been improved, taking into account the limits of wifi network scanning,
- Implemented automatic enabling of adding devices from the add wizard after entering primary user credentials,
- The ability to enter the name of the WiFi network from the keyboard has been introduced.

name: v2.3.46
body: - Additional clarifications have been introduced. Explanations are displayed by touching the warning icon.

name: v2.3.45
body: - Increased sensitivity to touch of the channel status icon

name: v2.3.44
body:
- An alternative icon (UV) has been added for the light switch,
- The Donate button has been removed.

name: v2.3.43
body: - Additional channel state display "Light source operating time"

name: v2.3.42
body:
- The ability to display several additional information about the channel has been introduced. Among others: IP address, mac address, WiFi signal quality or module uptime.
- The ability to change the light source lifespan settings from the application level has been introduced.

name: v2.3.41
body:
- Channel details - the channel caption has been moved from the footer to the header,
- Channel details - back button added,
- Dimmer / RGB window has been redesigned,
- V-Pro dimmer configuration window has been redesigned,
- Explanations for the V-Pro dimmer have been added,
- The option of choosing a slider instead of a wheel has been introduced.

name: v2.3.40
body: An issue with the "Close" button that occurred when the valve was previously closed manually, has been resolved.

name: v2.3.39
body: Phase-to-balance balance charts have been improved

name: v2.3.38
body: - Communication library update

name: v2.3.37
body: - Communication library update

name: v2.3.36
body: Connection bugfix

name: v2.3.35
body:
- Added display of energy meter values with vector balancing,
- New charts for energy meters - arithmetic / vector balance,
- The problem of displaying the user icon next to energy meters has been fixed.

name: v2.3.34
body: Z-wave configuration wizard ready for use

name: v2.3.33
body: Communication library update.

name: v2.3.32
body:
- Solves the problem of unexpected application closing in Android 4.1 and 4.2.
- Solves the problem of closing the application in Android <4.4 in the case of channel names or locations containing emoticons.

name: v2.3.30
body:
- Solution to the problem of adding devices on Android 10
- Repair of the automatic start of the configuration procedure of the device being added
- Communication library update
- Quicksand font update

name: v2.3.29
body:
- Support for heat meters and valves with flood sensor,
- Update communication library.

name: v2.3.28
body:
- Communication library update,
- "Host not found" message if it is not possible to set the server address based on the email address,
- Add device wizard - Enable update for all devices with the online update option available.

name: v2.3.26
body: Communication library update

name: v2.3.25
body:
- Update of the communication library solving the problem found in older versions of Android that work on board smartphones with an x86 architecture processor,
- The error occurring when changing from summer to winter time has been fixed.

name: v2.3.23
body:
- Improvements for Heatpol HomePlus
- Missing translations added
- Added support for Doyle & Tratt prototype dimmers (Varilight)

name: v2.3.22
body:
* Translation into Slovenian, Norwegian, Greek and Dutch

*Thanks to Slawek S.

name: v2.3.21
body:
- Small UI improvements
- Support for electricity meters with measurement over 65A

name: v2.3.20
body:
- Phase summation fix.
- Display of group details for the Home+ heater improved.

name: v2.3.19
body:
- Electricity Meter 
  1. Energy production charts have been added.   
  2. Added summation of all phases (1 + 2 + 3)
- HeatPol HomePlus+ 
  1. Temperature index fixed

name: v2.3.18
body:
- GUI enhancements (menu)
- HeatPol Home Plus - a slight change in the way of communication

name: v2.3.17
body:
- Missing translations
- Fixes and improvements

name: v2.3.16
body:
- Heatpol - Grouping
- Heatpol - Calendar
- The missing German translations have been added
- Communication library update

name: v2.3.15
body: The issue of throwing the StringIndexOutOfBoundsException exception has been resolved

name: v2.3.14
body: The problem of duplicates when upgrading a database version has been resolved

name: v2.3.13
body: Fixed a rare error causing thread deadlocks

name: v2.3.12
body: Added AuthKey and GUID encryption using a password based on the device ID

name: v2.3.10
body: Small fixes and improvements

name: v2.3.9
body: Small improvements

name: v2.3.8
body: The device configuration problem using Android 9.0 has been resolved.

name: v2.3.5
body:
- Additional filters for energy / water / gas consumption charts.
- Native library for armv8 architecture
- Update of the application icon
- The error related to the application crash has been fixed. Occurred while viewing charts.

name: v2.3.4
body: Dimmer / RGB - sending to the device an additional flag informing about pressing the On / Off button

name: v2.3.3
body: The unit displaying has been fixed when the impulse counter is offline

name: v2.3.2
body: A fix for displaying user icons for a gate with an partial sensor

name: v2.3.1
body: Improved database update procedure

name: v2.3.0
body:
Change the location background
Collapsing the location
Support for electricity meters
Support for pulse counter (energy, gas, water)
Displaying user icons
Temperature and humidity charts
Slovak translation
Fixes and improvements

name: v2.2.0
body:
-  channel group support
-  buttons hidden automatically when being touched
-  gate half-opening if
- new account creation in application window 
- staircase timer support 
- Lithuanian version 
- Czech version
- v9 protocol support 
- version number adjusted to CLOUD 
- fixes

name: v1.6.1
body:
- Support for SUPLA protocol v8
- New way of authorization.
- Basic - just by entering email address.
- Extended - requires entering access id, password and server details.
- Mailbox and an Open Window sensors have been added
- Alternative icons support added
- Adding I / O devices wizard

name: v1.4.7
body:
Channel color change when touched.
RGB - save function for selected color.
RGB - possibility to select white color.
Solved problem with location change.
New roller shutter control window.
Connection status for sensor channels added.
Italian, French, Portuquise and Spanisch translations added.

name: v1.2.1
body:
The 1.2.1 version allows to: 

* Open and close the gate
* Open and close garage doors
* Open the door 
* Open the gateway
* Open and close roller shutters
* Control RGB lighting
* Control light brightness level
* Turn the power on and off 
* Turn the lighting on and off 
* Monitor status of roller shutters, the gate, garage doors, the door and the gateway
* Monitor liquid sensor 
* Monitor distance sensor
* Monitor depth sensor
* Present temperature and humidity from a connected sensors
